divs: Sighting Detailslooked out window because of fireworks after election news, the whire glowing disc moved slowly to the west behind the trees. it lasted about 2min.I wasn't surprised this is where they all come too.I was excited about the election. after the event I finally slept. It suddenly appeared when I first noticed it.
Summary: The fireworks were going off and a white disc appeared moving slowley to west
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around November 4th 2008
